title: Hour 2 - (05-15-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - (05-15-20)
description:
Dan discusses what the implications could be for the Pittsburgh Steelers due to what James Harrison said about coach Mike Tomlin paying his 75 thousand dollar fine.
